history.proof: intros Q p q H. induction H. sfirstorder depth: 3use: reduceplus_ind, reduce_imp_reduceplus.

exceptions.tactic: intros cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os.
intros cs' eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os.
intros cs' eqA_dec' n ltM ltM_dec os.
intros cs' eqA_dec' n' ltM ltM_dec os.
intros cs' eqA_dec' n' ltM' ltM_dec os.
intros cs' eqA_dec' n' ltM' ltM_dec' os.
intros cs' eqA_dec' n' ltM' ltM_dec' os'.

original: intros Q p q H. induction H. - intros cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os. apply reduce_imp_reduceplus with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H. apply H. - intros cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os. apply reduceplus_ind with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H. apply H.
